About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals and original records to A3.

About.Access: One week's advance notice of visit and details of purpose of research required.

About.Acquisition focus: The history of Pymble Ladies College; official and administrative records of the Board and College administration; records donated by staff and students; records of organisations associated with the College.

About.References: Coleman, Margaret,This is Pymble College. Pymble Ladies College, 1991.
